post.body: I know, it's the worst! instead i just replied with "nope."
weird, we're flying back to Chicago tomorrow evening :)
why yes I DO have my DL# memorized. And HAHA you look young
no problem :) twinkle works pretty well!
fingers crossed! :)
yep, it's working :)
whew
oh, that's HILARIOUS
Landed. Guy just asked "do you smoke?" and I missed a golden opportunity to say something like "not on purpose." or something funny.
Wow, serious assholes in front of us http://snipurl.com/8c8dm
Sitting on the plane, waiting for departure
Waiting in line for the show
Sitting around at the Tropicana waiting for the doors to the 2:00 magic show to start... and looking like homeless runaways
Drives me crazy when unknown numbers call and don't leave a voicemail
Sitting at a Rainforest Cafe. This one doesn't have the tasty veggie burger on the menu. Everything but the cheese pizza is meat
Also, fear my lexicon!
Their rendition of Black by Pearl Jam was incendiary
Listening to a great live jukebox band
Sitting at a nice, quiet bar & grill on Fremont street.
Got back from the auto collection at the Imperial Palace.
How does a slot machine tournament work? Isn't it all luck?
Observation: Vegas is pretty lame if the shows you want to see are off, you find gambling a bore, and you don't drink. NIN was great though.
Need to fire up some Christmas movies tomorrow.
I regret that I can't work the word "oubliette" into more of my daily conversations. It's got to be one of my favorite words.
decided to order in tonight
the nicest older lady commended me for taking the stairs down. I usually feel like a dork for taking the elevator down 5 floors.
I really gotta get me a hat like this. It was very comfortable.
tried out Thunderbird 3.0 beta, but it keeps breaking significantly with gmail imap. Back to version 2!
Feeling close to 100% tonight. Shoo, cold!
I shouldn't be surprised, but I'm still amazed at how weird some Jeopardy contestants are.
the windchill yesterday got down to -31... probably even less (-40?). That's laughably cold.
Watching Dark Knight BluRay! Got it for Christmas
After playing through both games, it's my opinion that in gameplay and songs, Rock Band 2 is better than Guitar Hero World Tour.
God, I really dislike Van Halen
Blast XBox Live name length restrictions: my brother originally wanted ReeveOfDestruction, but it was too long
Wow, it is *cold* outside
Just hit 1000 cataloged CDs. And 600 Twitter updates. How appropriate!
Always impressed at how something can ship *from* Chicago, *to* Chicago... and the USPS can still take 6 days to deliver it.
Interesting that DayQuil now uses phenylephrine instead of pseudoephedrine: phenylephrine is less effective. But, it costs the same! Great!
starting to get a little loopy again from DayQuil. 'DayQuil was introduced in 1974 under the name "DayCare."' weird.
